QuestData.Title: Some Spraining to Do
QuestData.Description: Hop on, $n. Let's see what Mr. Ogreface has to say for himself.$B$BDon't be shy, Stormbeak's only ever dropped a passenger a couple of times before.
QuestData.LogDescription: Jump on Stormbeak and watch Mor'norokk's interrogation.
QuestData.RewardText: We have our answers, $n. Let's report back.
